Campus Director message about the campus: Since it’s interception in 1986 Ambedkar DSEU Campus has been a well-renowned institute in Delhi. The institute has left its marks in the field of education and has been an integral part of DSEU since its establishment. We here  promise them state of the art labs trained faculties and next level experience here with time full of enjoyment and education. We created various student chapters and clubs in our campus to give the students that opportunity and experience which they deserve.
Location of the Campus: Opp Madhuban Colony, Shakarpur Extn., Near Nirman Vihar Metro Station, Delhi-92
Information about the Campus: At Ambedkar DSEU Campus, we go beyond textbooks! Our industry-focused workshops and hands-on training sessions ensure you gain real-world skills, leading to exceptional campus placements. Our diploma students have secured impressive packages of over ₹3.2 LPA! With expert UPSC-qualified faculty and state-of-the-art labs, learning here is exciting and practical. Dive into vibrant student clubs—whether you love media, art, or technology, there’s something for everyone! Plus, our active college committees are always ready to support you, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable journey. Be a part of our dynamic community and kick-start your dream career!
Courses offered by the Campus: FTD Electronics, FTD Computers, BS Computer Application, UG ESDM, BTech ECE
Labs available in Campus: Digital Electronics Lab, Medical Electronics Lab, Project Lab, Analog Electronics Lab, Communication Lab, EDC Lab, Robotics Lab, Automated Control System Lab, Advance Microprocessor Lab, Electronic Machine Lab, NAT Lab, Networking Lab, Graphics Lab, Software Lab, Hardware Lab, IOT Lab, CA Lab

Campus Director message about the campus:
The DSEU Jaffarpur Campus offers a serene, pristine, and eco-friendly environment.
Our fully air-conditioned campus is designed to provide a comfortable and modern learning experience. It features:
Smart, air-conditioned classrooms and laboratories that enhance the teaching-learning process.
Lush green surroundings that create a pollution-free and noise-free atmosphere.
 DSEU Jaffarpur Campus is the perfect destination for students aspiring for growth, innovation, and success.
Information about the Campus: Our campus DSEU is located in Jafarpur, offers a serene and pristine environmen. Situated near the  NSUT(west Campus),Ayurvedic University, and  ITI . Our campus provides easy access to amenities. We take pride in our eco-friendly surroundings, boasting a noise-free and pollution-free environment, lush green spaces, and sustainable practices.Entire   building of this campus is fully air-contioned. It contains  smart ,air-conditioned, and medium sized  classrooms and laboratories. This campus is well connected by DTC buses. We will get DTC buses from  Uttham Nagar,  Dwarka, and Dhansa bus stop( nearest  Metro station) to our Campus. This campus provides a comprehensive learning experience, making it an ideal destination for students seeking growth, innovation, and success.
Courses offered by the Campus: Diploma in Computer Engg, Bachelor of Computer Applications BCA

Campus Director message about the campus:
Welcome to DSEU Ranhola Campus —a hub of learning, innovation, and skill development.

Our campus features smart classrooms, computer labs, and the Guru Shishya Library, fostering academic excellence and growth. We emphasize practical learning and holistic development to prepare students for future challenges.

Our dedicated faculty and supportive environment will guide you in achieving your aspirations. Together, let’s shape a brighter future!
Location of the Campus: Block- H2, Kunwar Singh Nagar,Near Sarvodaya Bal Vidyalaya Ranhola,Nangloi,Delhi-110041
Information about the Campus:
The DSEU Ranhola Campus, part of Delhi Skill and Entrepreneurship University (DSEU), is located in West Delhi at Kunwar Singh Nagar, Block-H2, Near Sarvodaya Bal Vidyalaya, Ranhola, Nangloi, Delhi-110041. Well-connected through public transport, it is easily accessible via the Nangloi Metro Station (Green Line) and DTTC bus services, ensuring convenience for students.

The campus features modern infrastructure, spacious classrooms, and well-equipped computer labs for enhanced learning. Smart classrooms with interactive panels promote technology-driven education. The Guru Shishya Library offers a vast collection of books, fostering a strong reading culture. With a career-oriented curriculum, the campus prepares students for real-world challenges and professional success.

Campus Director message about the campus: Welcome to Bhai Parmanand DSEU Campus! As a proud part of Delhi Skill and Entrepreneurship University, we are dedicated to fostering academic excellence, innovation, and skill development. Our dynamic curriculum, experienced faculty, and industry connections prepare students for real-world challenges. Here, we nurture creativity, leadership, and entrepreneurial spirit, empowering students to achieve their dreams. Join us in shaping a future filled with opportunities and success.
Information about the Campus: The importance of skill and technical education in India has grown significantly since independence, driven by advancements in technology and information. Recognizing this need, the Government of Delhi established an institute in 1965, later renamed the "Institute of Commercial Practice" in 1972, focusing on vocational courses in office management and secretarial practice. In 1986, it was relocated to Shakarpur and renamed Bhai Parmanand Institute of Business Studies (BPIBS) in honor of a Sikh martyr. In 2021, BPIBS merged with Delhi Skill and Entrepreneurship University (DSEU) to become Bhai Parmanand DSEU Campus, continuing its legacy of producing skilled professionals across diverse fields.
Courses offered by the Campus: MBA Data Analytics, MCA, B S Banking Financial Services and Insurance, B Tech in Artificial Intelligence, B Tech in Data Analytics
Labs available in Campus: Computer Lab 1 Software Lab, Computer Lab 2 DBMS Lab, Computer Lab 3 CISCO Lab, Computer Lab 4 Data Analytics Lab, Computer Lab 5 LINUX Lab

Campus Director message about the campus: DSEU Vivek Vihar Campus empowers youth with industry-relevant skills, knowledge, and an entrepreneurial mindset. Our vision is to be a center of excellence that nurtures talent, fosters industry collaboration, and develops future leaders. We offer a holistic education combining theory with practical application, enriched by co-curricular activities. With an inclusive learning environment, we cultivate skilled professionals and entrepreneurs committed to societal growth.
Location of the Campus: DSEU Vivek Vihar Campus, 1st floor, ITI Vivek Vihar (Women), Delhi-110095 Nearest Metro Station: Red Line-  Jhilmil/ Dilshad Garden Nearest Bus Stop: ITI Shahdara, ITI Vivek Vihar Geographical Location- https://goo.gl/maps/SSvRHMnT93kzLBfo7
Information about the Campus: DSEU’s Vivek Vihar Erstwhile WCS Vivek Vihar campus, established in 2013, is one of Delhi’s oldest skill development centers. With world-class infrastructure, it aims to provide quality training, fostering lifelong learning and industry-relevant skills. Located near Jhilmil Industrial Area, the campus is well-connected and surrounded by key commercial and healthcare hubs. It plays a vital role in bridging the gap between education and industry, nurturing professionals with strong ethical values. Through its commitment to skill education, the campus supports innovation, entrepreneurship, and employment opportunities, ensuring students are well-prepared to contribute meaningfully to society.
Courses offered by the Campus: BS Hospitality Management, BS Retail Management, BS Business Process Management, Certificate Course in Finance Executive, Certificate Course in Digital Marketing and Web development, MBA Retail Management, and Bachelor in Library Science
Labs available in Campus: 2 Computer Labs, 2 Retail Labs, 2 Personality Labs, and 2 Hospitality Labs

Campus Director message about the campus: The Guru Nanak Dev DSEU Campus is a true embodiment of DSEU’s mission to empower students with quality education, skill development, and an entrepreneurial mindset. With a dedicated team of highly qualified teaching and non-teaching staff, the campus ensures that students are well-prepared to meet industry demands. It boasts state-of-the-art infrastructure, fostering an environment that nurtures innovation and hands-on learning.
Information about the Campus:
The campus is conveniently connected to Delhi Metro’s Yellow and Red lines, with seamless last-mile connectivity through electric rickshaws and other transport options.

Guru Nanak Dev DSEU Campus offers a dynamic and inclusive learning environment that fosters growth and development for students and professionals alike. Surrounded by a thriving industrial ecosystem—including established enterprises and budding start-ups—the campus provides students with ample opportunities for practical exposure and industry collaborations, in line with DSEU’s vision of bridging the gap between education and employment.
Courses offered by the Campus: BTech Computer Science Engineering, Diploma in Petrochemical Engineering, Diploma in Polymer Technology, Diploma in Chemical Engineering, Diploma in Computer Engineering, Diploma in Electrical Engineering, Diploma in Electronics Engineering, Diploma in Mechanical Engineering
Labs available in Campus: Computer Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Electronical and Communication, Digital Electronics, Polymer Technology, Mechanical Engineering, Workshop
